name: Talk it Out
storyline: Everyone knows communication is the key to a successful relationship. So we decided to make it difficult for you! All you need is six minutes, two players, half a brain, and ample room for confusion.
summary: Talk It Out is a co-operative guessing game with a twist. Grab a friend, and start "talking"! You need to figure out what your co-player is seeing. Ask a question, get an answer. It sounds simple but it isn't when your choice of questions is less than co-operative. So choose wisely, and try to read between the lines. Because what is communication without interpretation? And don't forget that you're on a timer. No pressure.
